Adaptive.name: Adaptive
Adaptive.description: Roll 1 extra dice, choose one dice to lose after rolling

Tactical.name: Tactical
Tactical.description: You may save 1 dice roll and use its Energy next turn

Generous.name: Generous
Generous.description: Roll 1 extra dice Donate the lowest roll to one ally

Mobile.name: Mobile
Mobile.description: After your first move each turn, roll 1 more dice

Disciplined.name: Disciplined
Disciplined.description: If no dice rolls match, gain 1 Energy

Reckless.name: Reckless
Reckless.description: You may reroll all dice but must keep new roll
